meanings.sent1: She stretched the rubber band oblongly to fit it around the box.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar moved oblongly across the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The kite flew oblongly in the sky, looking like a colorful bird.
meanings.sent4: The river snaked oblongly through the valley, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The car sped oblongly down the winding road, leaving a trail of dust behind.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of an oblong.
meanings.sent1: He picked up the oblongly box and examined its contents.
meanings.sent2: The oblongly table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The oblongly cake on the table looked like a giant cookie.
meanings.sent4: The oblongly shadow of the tree stretched across the lawn.
meanings.sent5: The oblongly mirror on the wall made the room look bigger.
